import axios from "axios"; import { useState } from "react" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Login() { const [user, setUser] = useState({ email : "", password : "" }) const navigate = useNavigate() const handleLogin = async(e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log({user}); const res = await axios({ method : "post", url : "http://localhost:5000/api/user/login", data : user }) if (res.data.success === true) { localStorage.setItem("token", res.data.authToken) alert("You have logged in") setUser({ email : "", password : "" }) navigate("/") }else{ alert("Could not login check your creds") } console.log(res); } return ( <> {/* This example requires updating your template: ``` ``` */}

Sign in to your account

setUser({...user, email : e.target.value})} className="p-2 block w-full rounded-md border-0 py-1.5 text-gray-900 shadow-sm ring-1 ring-inset ring-gray-300 placeholder:text-gray-400 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-inset focus:ring-indigo-600 sm:text-sm sm:leading-6" />
setUser({...user, password : e.target.value})} className="block w-full rounded-md border-0 py-1.5 text-gray-900 shadow-sm ring-1 ring-inset ring-gray-300 placeholder:text-gray-400 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-inset focus:ring-indigo-600 sm:text-sm sm:leading-6" />
) }
